resources.string: WOLEWALEs Court Every meal is a delight, Wolewale is a farm which deals in selling fresh and life animals, produce ranging from Snails, Chicken, Smoked fish and Eggs. The company has traditionally served local livestock produce which is well dissected and properly packaged for consumption. We give you the best meal taste that can make you fresh and feel better, its chemical free, 100% Fresh, Killed, Cleaned and Well packaged, Our items do not last more than 24hrs and it is edible and easy to cook. We also make sale of a Day Old and Four(4)weeks Old chicks.
